alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brown, Outagamie and eastern Shawano Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 619 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Creek, or 14 miles northwest of Appleton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Black Creek around 630 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Green Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin.
